name: Kill The Virus Mutations
description:
The virus keeps spreading all around the world. The mankind seems destroyed and the hope is dying out. But it’s not the end. There is hope and that is … YOU.

Can you defeat the plague that is hunting our world? You can, but only with the help of a weapon. But which weapon could be strong enough to handle the virus? You guessed it right- a vaccine. With your power and the vaccine you can safe the world from this problem. Can you safe your friends and your lovely family? Let’s find out.

Controls (PC):

  • AD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Enter - Shoot
  • R - Reload

This Game should be taken light-heartedly
